letters.description: Identify the specific PCOS phenotype and baseline metabolic markers, including insulin resistance and androgen levels.
Implement low-glycemic nutrition and meal-timing strategies to stabilize blood sugar and lower hyperinsulinemia.
Address HPA axis dysfunction and hormonal imbalances to restore regular ovulatory cycles and reduce cortisol impact.
Prioritize strategic resistance training and movement to enhance cellular insulin sensitivity and metabolic rate.
Reduce systemic inflammation and environmental endocrine disruptors that exacerbate metabolic dysfunction.
Establish sustainable lifestyle habits and long-term monitoring protocols for permanent metabolic health and symptom remission.
